name: R.B.A: Robot Battle Arena
description:
This game is really short, but I hope you can enjoy it!

An arcade game in which you have to survive while killing as many enemy bots as you can in a limited amount of time.

This is my first game ever made. It was made as a part of the Indie Game Dev Beginners #003 gamejam where the theme was ROBOTS.

I had a ton of ideas while making this game, but I couldn't find time throughout the jam to implement most of them.
